body_html:
@rmlarsen I'm not really a decision maker here, so I will defer to others. I like 3 as I think it's better hygiene to wait until users can set things up before making decisions about the loggers.

@craigcitro might have some idea of whether this impacts stuff like Jupyter notebook logging in interesting ways.

body:
@rmlarsen I'm not really a decision maker here, so I will defer to others.  I like 3 as I think it's better hygiene to wait until users can set things up before making decisions about the loggers.

@craigcitro might have some idea of whether this impacts stuff like Jupyter notebook logging in interesting ways.
